content: woodland walk size yarn women s medium 300 - 400 yards gauge fingering / sock yarn 9 stitches = 1 in stockinette notions needles darning needle us size 1 / 2 50 mm circulars stitch markers or size needed to obtain gauge cuff co 64 stitches using old norwegian cast on/german twisted cast on methods or using your own favorite stretchy cast on divide stitches evenly on circulars using magic loop method 32 stitches per needle and join to work in the round *k1tbl p1 repeat from * for twisted ribbing for 15 rounds or desired length of cuff right leg needle a begin with row 1 of woodland walk leaf chart pm knit to end continue working chart in this manner until you ve reached desired length left leg needle a knit to last 16 stitches pm knit row 1 of woodland walk leaf chart knit to end continue working chart in this manner until you ve reached desired length heel flap heel flap is knit on needle b the instep stitches on needle a can be left on hold this slipstitch heel is worked flat across 32 stitches the first 3 and last 3 stitches are always knit repeat 4 row 32 row are completed and 16 purl bumps on heel flap edges row 1 ws k3 purl across k3 turn row 2 rs k3 sl1 k1 to last 3 stitches k3 turn row 3 ws k3 purl across k3 turn row 4 rs k3 k1 sl1 to last 3 stitches k3 turn short row heel turn continue knitting on needle b for heel flap you will now use short row to turn the heel row 1 sl1 p16 p2tog p1 turn row 2 sl1 k3 ssk k1 turn row 3 sl1 p to 1 stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 sl1 k to 1 stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn continue working row 3 & 4 back and forth until all stitches have been worked 18 stitches left gusset pick up and knit 16 stitches into the gaps between the purl bumps along the edge of the heel flap join instep stitches and continuing with the chart pattern for instep pick up 16 stitches on other edge of heel flap now work gusset decreases every other round as follows round 1 k to last 3 stitches on needle round 2 k one round even instep is b k2tog k1 k across instep in in pattern pattern k1 ssk on needle b continue decrease rounds until you have 64 stitches knit foot until 1 5 less than desired foot length continuing with the chart toe round 1 round 2 needle a k1 ssk knit to last 3 knit one round even stitches k2tog k1 on needle b k1 ssk and knit to last 3 stitches k2tog repeat until 12 stitches are left and k1 graft them together weave in all your ends block as desire chart is read from right to left bottom up
